scripts.start: npm run clean && npm run stop && npm run ganache:start && npm run truffle:migrate
scripts.test: npm run clean && npx --no-install truffle test
scripts.ganache:start: npx --no-install ganache-cli --mnemonic 'during page myth behave wish detail fantasy immune west release legend deliver' --networkId 1337 --noVMErrorsOnRPCResponse > ganache.log 2>&1 &
scripts.ganache:stop: kill `ps ax | grep ganache-cli | grep -v grep | awk '{print $1}'` 2> /dev/null; exit 0
scripts.poststart: npx --no-install truffle exec utils/createEnemies.js  --network local && npx --no-install truffle compile
